title: 5.14 Patch notes on MF are incomplete?
body:
Mf....in her patch notes...

Doesnt list her change in her passive 
"Strut (Passive)
Miss Fortune gains gradually increasing movement speed after not taking damage for a few seconds. 
[New] Strut now has increased scaling based on level, and only falls off when Miss Fortune takes direct, non-periodic damage."

and the duration on her e.
"Make It Rain (E)
Duration lowered to 2 seconds from 3 seconds
Slow increased to  40/45/50/55/60% from 25/35/45/55/65%"

replies.body:
I have the feeling that MF is unimportant for rito.
And after that patch MF has still the same problems.
